name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Title Tag & Meta Description Length Checker - Genelify

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily check the character length of the title and meta description on any webpage to ensure optimal SEO performance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Title Tag & Meta Description Length Checker is a Chrome extension designed to help users optimize their web pages for search engines by analyzing the lengths of title tags and meta descriptions. This tool provides valuable insights to ensure that these crucial elements meet SEO best practices, improving the chances of higher rankings in search engine results.

Features

- Real-Time Analysis: Instantly checks the lengths of title tags and meta descriptions of the currently active web page.
- SEO Best Practice Guidelines: Provides guidelines on optimal character limits for title tags (50-60 characters) and meta descriptions (50-160 characters).
- User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design, allowing users to easily view length metrics and receive suggestions for improvements.
Immediate Feedback: Delivers on-the-spot evaluations to assist users in refining their web content for better SEO performance.

To use the Title Tag & Meta Description Length Checker, simply follow these steps:

1. Navigate to the web page you wish to analyze.
2. Click on the Title Tag & Meta Description Length Checker extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
3. Wait for the extension to process the page. The lengths of the title tag and meta description will be displayed, along with recommendations for optimization.
4. Make any necessary adjustments to your title tags and meta descriptions based on the provided feedback.

Help & Support

For any issues, suggestions for improvements, or general inquiries, please reach out to our support team at support@genelify.com. We welcome your feedback and are here to assist you in enhancing your experience with our extension.
